1395930.name: Break The Chain
1395930.description:
Break the Chain is a cooperative puzzle game where you are trapped, chained, and forced to rely on skill, timing, and teamwork to escape. Every level presents new obstacles that require careful movement, smart decisions, and patience to overcome.

You can play solo and face the challenge on your own, or jump into co-op mode and work together with a friend. In co-op, coordination and communication are essential — one wrong move can pull everyone down.

The game focuses on physics-based challenges, environmental puzzles, and precise movement. There is no combat; progress depends entirely on how well you understand the mechanics and adapt to each situation. Falling means restarting, so every success feels earned.

Each stage pushes you further, testing your focus and persistence as the difficulty increases. The simple but tense atmosphere keeps the pressure high, making every step forward meaningful.

Whether you choose to break the chain alone or with a partner, your goal is clear:
Don’t fall. Don’t give up. Escape.
